word:
Children's Responsibility to Care for an Elderly Mother
     MARY CHASE WAS THE SISTER OF JAMES WHITE. DURING HIS LIFETIME HE AND ELLEN HAD CARED FOR HIS SISTER. AFTER JAMES DIED, ELLEN WHITE FELT SHE COULD NO LONGER BEAR THIS RESPONSIBILITY. SHE WROTE TO MARY'S DAUGHTER, ADELINE SAVAGE, CHALLENGING HER TO FULFILL HER DUTY IN CARING FOR HER MOTHER.
